title: Fork, ca. 1700–1800
creditline: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
description: Three-tined gilded fork, flaring at the join. Waisted shoulder, flat baluster-shaped neck. Banded ferrule. Irregular shaped white porcelain handle with polychrome decoration. On the front a woman with a basket, on the back a boy on a hobby-horse drinking from a glass, both boy and girl standing in from of a tree. Floral decoration at the top of the handle.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fork, ca. 1700–1800.
ca. 1700–1800. porcelain, gold, metal. The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg. 1985-103-223.
